authors: Contributors to The JH Movie Collection's Official Wiki
data.meta_description: Full credits for Happy Feet Two (2011). Warner Bros Pictures Presents In Assocation With Village Roadshow Pictures A Kennedy Miller Mitchell Production with Dr. D Studios Elijah Wood Robin Williams Hank Azaria Alecia Moore Brad Pitt Matt Damon Sofia Vergara Common Hugo Weaving Richard Carter...

data.text:
"Rhythm Nation"

Written by Janet Jackson, James Harris III & Terry Lewis

©1989 Black Ice Publishing, Licensed & administered by Sony/ATV Music Publishing Australia Pty Ltd, Flyte Tyme Tunes Licensed & administered by EMI Music Publishing Australia Pty Ltd

Produced by John Powell and Wade Robson

Performed by P!nk

P!nk appears courtesy of RCA Records, a division of Sony Music Entertainment

Originally released on Janet Jackson's 'Rhythm Nation 1814'.

Special thanks to Janet Jackson
